entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Grande-Quatre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -35.9°C
